title: Tommy Bolin - Whirlwind [320k MP3]
description:
Whirlwind, produced and compiled by Greg Hampton and Johnnie Bolin, is a spectacular collection of rare and unreleased recordings from famed guitarist of Deep Purple, James Gang and the Billy Cobham band, Tommy Bolin! The 2-CD digipak set features rare material from Bolin's jazz-rock band Energy, an epic 26 minute version of Marching Powder (here called Marching Bag) from the album Teaser, as well as songs Tommy was preparing for his third solo album before his untimely death in 1976!
